channel.title: Amnesia: A Machine For Pigs - Teaser

item.title: Amnesia: A Machine For Pigs - Teaser
item.dc:creator: Evod
item.description:
Ramirezoid:

They’ve been doing the ‘heh you can’t fight the ghoulies, IDIOT’ thing since penumbra. Would be interesting to at least have the option to cause the death of a few by accidentally triggering something heavy to fall on them.

Plenty of other games lets you kill the monsters and being powerless against your enemies in horror game works.

If it ain’t broke don’t fix it. Let it be.

Read full topic

item.source: Amnesia: A Machine For Pigs - Teaser

item.title: Amnesia: A Machine For Pigs - Teaser
item.dc:creator: Daedalus193
item.description:
fx.:

That doesn’t stop them from creating original assets. The ones in the teaser look out of place.

Yes. But like DiePoente said, I think they are just placeholders. The game is set in the same universe as the previous game. The background here is more industrial and there are many scenes on the trailer that we can see that (except for the very first part where we see a room that is exactly like the previous game and some machinery that resembles The Dark Descent).

I hope they don’t post any picture of the monsters

Read full topic

item.source: Amnesia: A Machine For Pigs - Teaser

item.title: Amnesia: A Machine For Pigs - Teaser
item.dc:creator: Daedalus193
item.description:
fx.:

This didn’t look good at all.
Why would they re-use almost every asset from the previous game? I thought since this would use HPL3, they would’ve at least made more original stuff. So far this just looks like a mod for TDD.

The only thing that seems to be better is the audio.

I think it is using HPL Engine 2 the same for The Dark Descent. HPL Engine 3 in development but won’t be used for this game.

Read full topic
item.source: Amnesia: A Machine For Pigs - Teaser

item.title: Amnesia: A Machine For Pigs - Teaser

item.description:
I guess much of what has been shown have been placeholders. Many devs do this, because the game isn’t finished anyway.

item.title: Amnesia: A Machine For Pigs - Teaser
item.dc:creator: Medevilae
item.description:
Can’t say I was disappointed with the length of the first game, bought it cheap in the Humble Bundle, and it is cheap to begin with.

I’m definitely all for a longer Amnesia game though.

Hoping they’ll be able to vary the gameplay a bit, would be a shame if this game is just Amnesia:TDD in a different flavor.

Read full topic
